Notes on Width in Tailwind CSS:

  • Fixed widths: w-4, w-8, w-16, etc. (w-4 = 1rem, w-8 = 2rem, etc.)
  • Percentage widths: w-1/2 (50%), w-1/3 (33.333%), w-1/4 (25%), w-3/4 (75%)
  • Full width: w-full - 100% of parent container
  • Screen widths: w-screen - 100vw (viewport width)
  • Auto width: w-auto - Size based on content
  • Min/Max widths: min-w-0, max-w-xs, max-w-sm, max-w-md, etc.
  • Arbitrary values: w-[900px], w-[50%], w-[10rem]
  • Responsive widths: sm:w-1/2, md:w-full, lg:w-1/3
